headline: Visa, CVS, and 4 More Oversold Stocks Worth a Look Before Earnings
summary: Stocks that have gained too much are more susceptible to big drops than companies that dropped heading into their results.

raw.headline: Visa, CVS, and 4 More Oversold Stocks Worth a Look Before Earnings
raw.summary: Stocks that have gained too much are more susceptible to big drops than companies that dropped heading into their results.

headline: HONEYWELL ANNOUNCES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND
summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend payment of $1.13 per share on the Company's common stock. The dividend is payable on September 5, 2025, out of surplus to holders of record at the close of business on August 15, 2025.

raw.headline: HONEYWELL ANNOUNCES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND
raw.summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend payment of $1.13 per share on the Company's common stock. The dividend is payable on September 5, 2025, out of surplus to holders of record at the close of business on August 15, 2025.

headline: Honeywell vulnerability exposes building systems to cyber attacks
summary: Researchers have found vulnerabilities in the Niagara Framework, developed by a Honeywell company, which could allow attackers to disable building automation and security systems.

raw.headline: Honeywell vulnerability exposes building systems to cyber attacks
raw.summary: Researchers have found vulnerabilities in the Niagara Framework, developed by a Honeywell company, which could allow attackers to disable building automation and security systems.

headline: UAV Propulsion Market Forecast to Reach $11.3 Billion by 2030: Projections by Technology, Component, Platform, MTOW and Region Featuring Profiles of Industry Leaders
summary: The power source segment is predicted to lead growth, driven by the demand for electric drones that prioritize advanced battery management and clean propulsion technologies. The 150-600 KG MTOW class also boosts market expansion, serving military and commercial needs for medium-sized UAVs. North America, led by the US, will dominate due to its robust UAV ecosystem. headline: HON Q2 Deep Dive: Portfolio Overhaul, Margin Pressure, and Guidance Lift
summary: Industrial conglomerate Honeywell (NASDAQ:HON) reported Q2 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 8.1% year on year to $10.35 billion. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $40.8 billion at the midpoint came in 1.2% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.75 per share was 3.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
